Reviews.Title: Great phones phone
Reviews.Author: A. L. Lapalme "Arthur-A"
Reviews.Content: I purchased phone used. It arrived fast & in great condition. 100% functional.Have been using for over two months. Its the best phone I have owned yet. Hardly ever crashes or freezes and throughput speed is excellent. Works & connects even when signal is weak.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: daisy09
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to replace my daughter's that had been damaged. She previously had the Samsung Galaxy SIII and liked it so much that she wanted an exact replacement for it.

Reviews.Title: Great phone at a great price
Reviews.Author: nordish
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent phone in every way, it came in perfect condition, and there have been no problems with this phone.

Reviews.Title: I like this phone
Reviews.Author: Shawna-Lin Hamel
Reviews.Content: I particularly like the feature that silences notification and calls during certain hours unless from specified people. Since my phone used to bing all night from random emails or being tagged or someone responding to a thread, I particularly love this feature!

Reviews.Title: Used Battery
Reviews.Author: wrong lights
Reviews.Content: Phone said "new" but when received the battery was used.  Will not keep charge longer than the old phone I got rid of of, disappointed that need to now go buy a battery.

Reviews.Title: I loved it
Reviews.Author: Taylor H.
Reviews.Content: I loved this phone. Unfortunetly  I fell and broke my phone about a week ago. I was so upset I cried my eyes out. I only had it for about 2 or 3 months but I really liked it. I used it with straight talk service. My only complaint was that I had a lot of people tell me that they had called me and my phone would never ring.

Reviews.Title: Replacement Phone
Reviews.Author: Soccer Mom
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to replace my Galaxy III that I already owned my battery was not keeping a charge and the screen was shattered. This phone was better than expected. Great purchase, I would recommend it to anybody.

Reviews.Title: Good enough phone, needed a little more info in the listing description
Reviews.Author: J. Munyon
Reviews.Content: You'll need to buy a SIM card if you use Verizon.  Sometimes it's better to buy this phone and just go to a corporate Verizon store and have them put the SIM card in when you get it activated.  Chances are you'll have to go to that store to get the phone activated anyway.The phone I bought here on AMAZON didn't have the SIM card, just an empty slot.You'll want to buy a SD micro memory card if you don't have one already.  I recommend at least 16 GB if not 32 GB.  The phone I bought here on AMAZON didn't have the SD micro memory card, just an empty slot.This is a fairly bare bones purchase option.  You're still going to want to buy an Otter Box Defender series (or equivalent) type case.  You'll want either that or a silicone slip cover for it, and screen protector sheets.  The phone is seriously thin, and tough for big guy hands to hang onto.  You might want a stylus if you text a lot.You get the phone, a battery, a charger, a USB data cable, and that's about it.  If you want the manual, go online to Verizon or to Samsung websites.I had the Samsung Galaxy S4 (next size up) and didn't like it because it is so big; I may as well carry a tablet or laptop.  I have also had the Samsung Continuum (which is the very first Galaxy class).  The Continuum is reminiscent of the banana phone early cell phones, and has an inadequate camera, plus a very small screen.  The Samsung Galaxy S III is a great bridge between, the 8 megapixel main camera is far superior to the Continuum (5 megapixel), but not quite as benchmark as the Galaxy S4 which has a 13 megapixel main camera.  The S III  and S4 have front cameras for webcam style video communication (not much difference between the S III and S4 front cameras - 2 megapixel or less).I like the Samsung Galaxy S III and consider it to be easier to use than the Samsung Continuum, however, this AMAZON listing would have had happier customers who bought here, if AMAZON mentioned that purchasers still need to buy the SD micro memory chip and be prepared to get their own SIM chip for this phone.

Reviews.Title: beautiful
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: very happy with my new phone. Wanted a s5 but didnt want to pay cost and I feel this is just as good.

Reviews.Title: Great phone - Great Delivery Time
Reviews.Author: Efrain Rivera
Reviews.Content: My wife's Galaxy III phone recently died and was un-repairable. With our contract with Verizon being up in a few months, I just wanted to purchase an inexpensive replacement for her. The phone we purchased from "Custom for All" through Amazon was perfect. It looked better than new. There wasn't a single scratch on it. Took it to Verizon right away to get it set up and the Verizon technician was impressed at the quality for a used phone. The delivery time from "Custom for all" was also great! I would recommend them to anyone! Thanks!

Reviews.Title: No Touchscreen
Reviews.Author: DO-NOT-BUY
Reviews.Content: After a long time of shipping and handling I got the phone and came with NO TOUCHSCREEN. Did not say in description that is had no screen

Reviews.Title: Doesn't function properly
Reviews.Author: Rea Johnson
Reviews.Content: the phone came in good time and seemed in good condition, but once the phone was on it has ALOT of technical problems and i'll probably have to get a different phone. The screen locks while im using it, "phone options" pops us a couple times every minute which is very annoying and above all the battery doesn't last a full or even half a day. I thought i could work around the problems but really if i wasn't in need of a phone now i would return it cause its more of a hassle then good.

Reviews.Title: volume button donsent work
Reviews.Author: Zae Cooper
Reviews.Content: volume button donsent work its a major malfunction other than that [hpne is good show signs of wear but good product

Reviews.Title: Wonderful phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was stuck in a contract with Verizon with a phone I hated so I bought this phone.  I love it!  It works wonderfully.  The only issue is battery life, which is an issue with any Android phone.  Aside from that, this is a wonderful phone.

Reviews.Title: Returned
Reviews.Author: Spunky
Reviews.Content: This item was returned and I still have not received any refund or gift certificate. It was an "unlocked" phone and did not say so in the description. Also, it had issues with the camera not working properly

Reviews.Title: Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Patricia Hines
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my phone! I got exactly what I wanted and the phone was in mint condition! I got exactly what the description said!

Reviews.Title: So loving my phone!!!
Reviews.Author: Jeanine diggs
Reviews.Content: I was scared to make this large price purchase but I should not have been! This is the best phone I have ever had!! And Verizon recognizes it as a brand new phone and covered it immediately on my insurance! Great experience!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone and store!
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I received the phone faster than they said and it was in near perfect condition. It is working GREAT! VERY HAPPY!!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone, even Better Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Bernard Mayers
Reviews.Content: My phone was recently stolen so I decided to purchase a new one.  MobileKarma not only had the best price on the S3, they shipped it very quickly.  When it arrived, I noticed the back was a little bent and the charger didn't work.  I emailed them and the following day they emailed me back to inform me that they would bs shipping me replacements.  I would definitely recommend them to anyone looking to buy a refurbished phone.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: Alaisia Beatty
Reviews.Content: The Phone came right before my birthday, which i desperately needed it to. I was worried because I never ordered something so important, like my phone, used or over the internet, but i was so very happy. It said it was slightly scratched but it looked pretty much brand new. The charger had a short in it but who cares because those things arent very hard to come by anymore so i really didnt care.

Reviews.Title: This Was Such A Score!
Reviews.Author: Aaliyah Anderson
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for a month and it's perfect for me. I love it! No probelm or anything with it!

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: leah
Reviews.Content: This phone was delivered on time and in the condition promised. It has no scratches or dings and looks brand new. It's completely functional and works on with Verizon. I am totally satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: denise bailey
Reviews.Content: Looks and works great. I am very happy with my new phone. The colors and sound clarity are awesome. Thank you !!!

Reviews.Title: great phone....
Reviews.Author: Tara Littleton
Reviews.Content: I love the phone! Great condition and works great! It I ssid just what I was looking for in a phone!

Reviews.Title: new phone
Reviews.Author: Karen M Prepeluh
Reviews.Content: The only problem I had was it is always on roam.  But since Verizon never charges for that feature, it doesn't matter to me I kept it anyway.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Tbird22
Reviews.Content: Works great. No lag. Build quality is better than expect. When it comes time to get a different phone this phone has made me a believer in samsung phone quality.

Reviews.Title: this phone is not what  I through it was
Reviews.Author: Christopher Turner
Reviews.Content: It took the TECH almost two hours to turn the phone on. it did not have the ID number in the back of the phone. it would not go back to factory setting. The TECH said that this was a Flashed phone. I don't know what that mean but it did not sound good ;then he started asking me question about the phone Ex. "like where did you get this phone" .how long have you had this phone. I was good I allowed him to work on the phone as he ask the question. It look good the battery life is good for now. It will hold a charge. there is a lot more that I can said about this phone but I will wait I think that I will go will the NEW Samsung Galaxy S V by Verizon.

Reviews.Title: Very good item, awesome phone
Reviews.Author: Mitchell Llorens
Reviews.Content: Awesome product. AAA+++Awesome product. AAA+++This phone is everything everyone gas said, every day you learn something new.You are gonna love this phoneAwesome

Reviews.Title: love this phone!
Reviews.Author: Janette Folckemer
Reviews.Content: After a lot of research I knew I wanted a Galaxy S3. The only problem was I have an unlimited data plan and so I needed to buy the phone. The phone was advertised in very good condition and it sure was! I am very, very happy!

Reviews.Title: I was nervous buying a phone without seeing. It arrived and was very pleased to see it was in original package a brand new...
Reviews.Author: eric sim
Reviews.Content: I gave this rating because I received my galaxy s III promptly. I was relieved I wasn't scammed..it was brand new and everything original and at an awesome price...would definitely recommend this phone!

Reviews.Title: Not buying from again.
Reviews.Author: Janet
Reviews.Content: You would have think a child banged up this phone. The software is already glitches up on me, and the phone just does the most abstract things when you don't even mess with it (like dropping signal when you're at a great place for signal) or showing up error messages that dont apply to what you're doing. Also leaves things running on my screen that won't go away unless I restart the phone.  The shipping was ridiculous,  it shipped from California yes, but it continued to be shipped around California for a whole day. Why didn't you just get it out to my address? That was quite frustrating. You pay for something and they delay it like that.

Reviews.Title: Not able to use.
Reviews.Author: April Gerlitzki
Reviews.Content: I had no idea I needed a sim card to use this phone. Also I thought it was unlocked and able to use with Page Plus. NOW I have a phone that I can't even use.

Reviews.Title: pleased with the quality
Reviews.Author: Timothy m.cummins
Reviews.Content: Good quality phone. Had to replace the battery. It was an added expense. Overall  it is in good shape. Im pleased

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Charlene Gann
Reviews.Content: Great phone. Love it. Can do a lot more with this phone than my previous one. Android phones are the best.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Lori
Reviews.Content: This was a refurbished phone, but it seems brand new to me (and to my daughter who received it as a gift)!  Top notch everything-from ease of ordering, shipping, price, to quality of product!

Reviews.Title: Great phone. Lightyears better than my old razor m which was not old at all
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "walking girl"
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. It works well.  It is very fast and so far I have no problems at all.  It is a delight compared to my razor m I purchased one year ago.  Night and day difference.

Reviews.Title: The phone is good.
Reviews.Author: Sally
Reviews.Content: Sometimes it has problems with the back ground. Then you have to turn it off and back on before it works right again.  It has nothing to do with the seller though.  just a known problem with that phone.

Reviews.Title: love
Reviews.Author: Ronne42
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. It is a great phone, easy to manage and takes great pics. takes good pics as well.

Reviews.Title: Horrible quality
Reviews.Author: brooke snedecor
Reviews.Content: It didnt work 2 days after I got it and the battery never charges even when it's on the charger.

Reviews.Title: KOREAN PHONE USELESS and RETURNED!!#^&/^/^##^
Reviews.Author: Captobx
Reviews.Content: I would have used 0 stars but could not.  After inserting my SIM and memory card Phone was locked with no menu and words on screen were in Korean!Received RMA label via Amazon support same day for return...

Reviews.Title: Apple Who???
Reviews.Author: Shannon Dannel "Book Worm"
Reviews.Content: I got this phone from BB-123, and it is fantastic.  Customer Service was awesome, shipping was quick and fantastic and the phone itsself is flawless....  I have been a strong "Apple" supporter, but I love this Samsung phone...I would strongly recommend this seller to anyone, they were so great and easy to deal with...I love it!

Reviews.Title: Texa Auto Recognition
Reviews.Author: Ron A.
Reviews.Content: Text message auto recognition program does not work very good, type in 3-4 characters and it still does not recognize the word,  over 50% of the time you have to type out the entire word...what a bore.

Reviews.Title: Verizon will not unlock the phone!
Reviews.Author: W. Brunner
Reviews.Content: Having spent over five hours between Tracfone, Samsung and Verizon trying to get this activated with Tracfone. Samsung stated Verizon should unlock a no contract phone. Verizon has refused. I will be returning this and look for a contracted S4. What little I did get to do with the phone was impressive compared to my Samsung Centura Tracfone.I have not been pleased with any Tracfones I have purchased. It seems you get what you pay for when it comes to cell phones and services.

ProductInfo.Features:
The Samsung Galaxy S III features 4G LTE speeds, 1.5GHz dual-core S4 processor, and a gorgeous Super AMOLED 4.8-inch display Also features 8-megapixel camera capable of recording HD video and still images simultaneously
NFC technology, 16GB memory, microSD slot for additional storage, Wi-Fi, GPS, and quadband GSM modes for international use
This device also offers access to thousands of apps, games, movies, books, and music on the Google Play Store.
This product has been extensively tested, is certified to be 100% functional, and ready for activation
CDMA Verizon Wireless & GSM Unlocked No Warranty (A data plan may be required to activate this smartphone, please contact carrier)
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy S lll/S3 SCH-i535 CDMA Verizon & GSM Unlocked with 4.8" HD Super AMOLED Screen, 8MP Camera, Android OS 4.0, A-GPS and Wi-Fi - No Warranty Marble White
